verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:14
verses.text: And they sware unto the Lord with a loud voice, and with shouting, and with trumpets, and with cornets.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:15
verses.text: And all Judah rejoiced at the oath: for they had sworn with all their heart, and sought him with their whole desire; and he was found of them: and the Lord gave them rest round about.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:16
verses.text: And also concerning Maachah the mother of Asa the king, he removed her from being queen, because she had made an idol in a grove: and Asa cut down her idol, and stamped it, and burnt it at the brook Kidron.
